thread.title: The This Is Us Cast Debunked Some Theories About Jack's Death
thread.title_full: The This Is Us Cast Debunked Some Theories About Jack's Death

title: The This Is Us Cast Debunked Some Theories About Jack's Death
text: By Emma Dibdin Mar 20, 2017 How did Jack Pearson die? The This Is Us season finale delivered a whole lot of nothing as far as answers go–although you did find out a few other things about Milo Ventimiglia's beloved patriarch, including his near-miss past as a petty criminal. But at this weekend's PaleyFest panel, the show's cast and creators did throw fans a bone by debunking a few of the many, many theories about Jack's death. Advertisement   In a nutshell, per Entertainment Weekly , Jack is not getting murdered. His best friend Miguel (Jon Huertas, who controversially ends up with Rebecca after Jack's death) does not kill him. Executive producers John Requa and Glenn Ficarra also dismissed the possibility that Kate (Chrissy Metz) was speaking literally when she revealed she is responsible for Jack's death—she didn't kill her dad, accidentally or otherwise. Most Popular One popular theory that was not debunked though? Jack dying in a plane crash, as hinted at by Kate's fear of flying and Kevin throwing out all his model airplanes after his father's death. Ficarra also offered this ambiguous teaser: "We got to see Jack from a certain perspective this season, and I think we might get him from another perspective in other characters [next season]." Only six-ish months to wait...
